Posts.Content: Hi Lemongrass, I am about to embark on my first FEC due the 13th or 14th was ment to be Friday the 10th but I'm going to assist with 2 clinical trials so it delayed the start...im a bit apprehensive about it but I too took some control back and went & got me hair cut short. Will be keen to monitor ur progress through this as I too seem to have the same cycle but my operation is going to be at the end of chemo. We are attending the Genetics clinic to get tests done to see if I have the gene if so then its a double mastectomy waiting for me at the end if not then a lumpectomy will suffice... I hope everything goes well for you & Anna K  Take care lits of hugs  Angie
Posts.Title: First Session of FEC T

Posts.Content: Wow you have had some journey already Lemongrass... as everyone keeps telling me I'm a positive person and I can beat this yes I know I can....... but some of it just seems very scary....not going to admit that to my family.... we have a it is what it is now let deal with it and move on attitude.... I suppose u get days where you wobble a bit but then i need to shake it off and carry on.... Thanks for sharing your journey.... this forum is great I think it allows us to prepare mentally when reading other people' events.... Take care & big hugs  Angie Xxx
Posts.Title: First Session of FEC T

Posts.Content: Awe Lemongrass thanks for sharing. I really hope u got ur KFC.... Yeah I've got alot in reserve to be able to go a few days without food lol..... I hope u get stronger each day positive thinking they say is gonna get us all through this but I think we r more than entitled to have a few wobbles..... but u seem a very positive person also....I am looking at this a process until they tell me otherwise... Speak soon take care xxx Angie
Posts.Title: First Session of FEC T

Posts.Content: Hi Linsw I am going on the Neo & Rosco trials.... got all my bloods done yesterday along with my visit to the genetic team.... I still think I'm just part of a process that I need to follow but yesterday with talking to genetics made me sort of realise I need to pay attention to this since they were talking about double cancers anywhere else got a bit of a wake up call shall we say.....  We are hoping to kick off the Chemo next week for me do u have a date yet Linsw???  Take care big hugs Angie xx

Posts.Content: Good luck today Kim thinking of u xxx rest up
